name: TaskBreakDown.com
body:
I've been meaning to write a hierarchical task list for a long time (I have another repo I started, but never finished from 2 years ago!) and this RailsCamp I decided to write a proper, working MVP.

This version of the app was made for mobile first, so if you are browsing here on Chrome, you will need to emulate touch events in the dev tools.

[Go on to m.taskbreakdown.com](m.taskbreakdown.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
